doc.name: SequencedVariable
doc.description: A variable that can share state across multiple instances and is used in the sequence domain.
doc.author: Elizabeth Latronico
doc.property: A parameter to hold the output initial value. This parameter just copies the value in the initial value parameter. It is needed because its name depends on the output port. FIXME: In the future, upgrade to an interface with a function to do this.
Delete this later when icon is figured out!!
